And noone's given me their thought on my idea.  Vector Sigma is 
Primus's brother, they fought Unitron together, had different ideas 
for Cybertron, so Primus sealed him in the oracle computer with the 
key to Vector Sigma (hence "the key") and made a pure technological 
planet.  I want some feedback on that idea.  Positive or negative 
(shutup LN I didn't mean you).
